input:
On the table, you see a bunch of items arranged in a row: a purple dog leash, a silver pencil, and a black bracelet. What is the color of the item furthest from the dog leash?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
